name: GRANITE POINT MORTGAGE TRUST INC.

footnote: The condensed consolidated balance sheets include assets of consolidated variable interest entities, or VIEs, that can only be used to settle obligations of these VIEs. At September 30, 2017 and December 31, 2016, assets of the VIEs totaled $46,052 and $46,047, respectively. See Note 3 - Variable Interest Entities for additional information.
